title: Decision & Idea Insights
description: Perspectives on problems and approaches for everyday and complex decisions, helping you think clearly and confidently.

title: Business & Startup Perspectives
description: Refining ideas, assessing risks, and strengthening organizations, vision, and strategy for founders and executives.

title: Philosophical Questions
description: Wrestling with ambiguous, personal questions and figuring out what aligns with your values and the consequences worth considering.

title: Reading the Room
description: Noticing patterns, sensing dynamics, and naming what's happening beneath the surface, with clear, grounded insight.
